results.title: Silent Myocardial Infarction: A Case Report
results.text_hl: Typically, @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ presenting with @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@MI@@@ may exhibit symptoms of @DISEASE_Chest_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@, squeezing chest pressure, and @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@shortness of breath@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@SOB@@@) at rest or upon minimal exertion.

citations.NLM: Kolesova MV, Minor S. Silent Myocardial Infarction: A Case Report Cureus. 2023 Aug;15(8):e43906. PMID: 37638270
citations.BibTeX: @article{37638270, title={Silent Myocardial Infarction: A Case Report}, author={Kolesova MV and Minor S}, journal={Cureus}, volume={15}, number={8}, pages={e43906}}

results.title: Worsening Hypothyroidism in the Setting of New-Onset Nephrotic Syndrome
results.text_hl: Her symptoms gradually improved after receiving a higher dose of @CHEMICAL_Thyroxine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013974 @@@levothyroxine@@@, along with diuretics and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ initiation.

citations.NLM: Wang Q, Ravi D, Tang Z, Nand N, Dahhan A. Worsening Hypothyroidism in the Setting of New-Onset Nephrotic Syndrome Cureus. 2023 Aug;15(8):e43345. PMID: 37701005

results.title: Lisinopril versus placebo in the treatment of heart failure: the Lisinopril Heart Failure Study Group.
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, the increase in exercise duration was accompanied by an improvement in quality of life as measured by the Yale Scale @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@Dyspnea@@@/@DISEASE_Fatigue @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@Fatigue@@@ Index and in signs and symptoms of @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@.

citations.NLM: Beller B, Bulle T, Bourge RC, Colfer H, Fowles RE, Giles TD, Grover J, Whipple JP, Fisher MB, Jessup M. Lisinopril versus placebo in the treatment of heart failure: the Lisinopril Heart Failure Study Group. J Clin Pharmacol. 1995 Jul;35(7):673-80. PMID: 7560247

results.text_hl: A Man in His 50s With @DISEASE_Hemoptysis @DISEASE_MESH:D006469 @@@Hemoptysis@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@Dyspnea@@@, and Bilateral Patchy Ground-Glass Opacities.

results.title: Short- and long-acting angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors: a randomized trial of lisinopril versus captopril in the treatment of congestive heart failure. The Multicenter Lisinopril-Captopril Congestive Heart Failure Study Group.
results.text_hl: Improvement in functional capacity and quality of life, as assessed by the Yale Scale @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@dyspnea@@@/@DISEASE_Fatigue @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@fatigue@@@ index, was significantly greater for the @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ group.

citations.NLM: Giles TD, Katz R, Sullivan JM, Wolfson P, Haugland M, Kirlin P, Powers E, Rich S, Hackshaw B, Chiaramida A. Short- and long-acting angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors: a randomized trial of lisinopril versus captopril in the treatment of congestive heart failure. The Multicenter Lisinopril-Captopril Congestive Heart Failure Study Group. J Am Coll Cardiol. 1989 May;13(6):1240-7. PMID: 2539403

results.title: Daily Lisinopril vs Placebo for Prevention of Chemoradiation-Induced Pulmonary Distress in Patients With Lung Cancer (Alliance MC1221): A Pilot Double-Blind Randomized Trial.
results.journal: Int J Radiat Oncol Biol Phys
results.text_hl: Few PRO measures suggested that compared with the placebo arm, @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ had less @DISEASE_Cough @DISEASE_MESH:D003371 @@@cough@@@, less @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@shortness of breath@@@, fewer symptoms from @DISEASE_Lung_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D008175 @@@lung cancer@@@, less @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@dyspnea@@@ with both walking and climbing stairs, and better overall quality of life (for all, P < .05).

citations.NLM: Sio TT, Atherton PJ, Pederson LD, Zhen WK, Mutter RW, Garces YI, Ma DJ, Leenstra JL, Rwigema JM, Dakhil S, Bearden JD, van der Veen SJ, Ganti AK, Schild SE, Miller RC. Daily Lisinopril vs Placebo for Prevention of Chemoradiation-Induced Pulmonary Distress in Patients With Lung Cancer (Alliance MC1221): A Pilot Double-Blind Randomized Trial. Int J Radiat Oncol Biol Phys. 2019 Mar 1;103(3):686-696. PMID: 30395904
citations.BibTeX: @article{30395904, title={Daily Lisinopril vs Placebo for Prevention of Chemoradiation-Induced Pulmonary Distress in Patients With Lung Cancer (Alliance MC1221): A Pilot Double-Blind Randomized Trial.}, author={Sio TT and Atherton PJ and Pederson LD and Zhen WK and Mutter RW and Garces YI and Ma DJ and Leenstra JL and Rwigema JM and Dakhil S and Bearden JD and van der Veen SJ and Ganti AK and Schild SE and Miller RC}, journal={Int J Radiat Oncol Biol Phys}, volume={103}, number={3}, pages={686-696}}

results.title: Quality of life with ACE inhibitors in chronic heart failure.
results.text_hl: The Minnesota Living with @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@Heart Failure@@@ Questionnaire has demonstrated the benefits of @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ in some but not all circumstances and the Yale @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@Dyspnea@@@-@DISEASE_Fatigue @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@Fatigue@@@ Index improves with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

results.title: The efficacy of cibenzoline for reducing the left ventricular pressure gradient of hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy: A case report.
results.text_hl: A 46 year-old man with @DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy@@@ (@DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@HOCM@@@) was referred to this clinic complaining of @<m>DISEASE_Dyspnea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@shortness of breath@@@. His symptoms remained even after he had been treated with @CHEMICAL_Bisoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017298 @@@bisoprolol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@.

citations.NLM: Igarashi H. The efficacy of cibenzoline for reducing the left ventricular pressure gradient of hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy: A case report. J Med Ultrason (2001). 2003 Jun;30(2):111-4. PMID: 27278166
